author: shazron
msg: Fix for static analyzer warning in PhoneGapLib.

author: shazron
msg: Fixes #191 PhoneGap app re-suspends when resumed after Airplane Mode toggled

author: becka11y
msg: refs #182 updated getCurrentPosition to update _position variable
Fixed bug where seekTo was setting the _position value in milliseconds rather than seconds. getCurrentPosition was not setting _position to -1 when media was not playing.

author: becka11y
msg: fixes #186 return null when no organization information
iOS was incorrectly returning an organization object with all null values when there was no organization information.  It now correctly returns null.
